Package org.neo4j.kernel.impl.query

Interface QuerySubscriber

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    QuerySubject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BoltAdapterSubscriber, QuerySubject.BasicQuerySubject, QuerySubject.RecordQuerySubscriber, QuerySubject.TaggingQuerySubject, QuerySubscriberAdapter, ResultSubscriber, RowDroppingQuerySubscriber
    public interface QuerySubscriber
    A QuerySubscriber is used for streaming result from a query.

    Used in conjunction with a QuerySubscription. The subscription will demand a number of records, QuerySubscription.request(long), and when there is data available the subscriber will receive a call chain like. 

         onResult(3)
     onRecord()
     onField(0, v1)
     onField(1, v2)
     onField(2, v3)
     onRecordCompleted()
     onRecord()
     onField(0, v1)
     onField(1, v2)
     onField(2, v3)
     onRecordCompleted()
     ...
     onResultCompleted(stats)

    Or if some error occurs along the way we will have a call to onError.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static QuerySubscriber DO_NOTHING_SUBSCRIBER
      Dummy implementation that will throw whenever it is being called.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void onError​(Throwable throwable)
      Called if an error occurs
      void onField​(int offset, AnyValue value)
      Writes the field.
      void onRecord()
      Called whenever a new record is ready to be written
      void onRecordCompleted()
      The current record has been completed
      void onResult​(int numberOfFields)
      Called at the beginning of a stream, guaranteed to be called exactly once.
      void onResultCompleted​(QueryStatistics statistics)
      The result stream is done, no more data to stream.
      static void safelyOnError​(QuerySubscriber subscriber, Throwable t)
      Call onError while suppressing any new exception.

    • Field Detail

      • DO_NOTHING_SUBSCRIBER

        static final QuerySubscriber DO_NOTHING_SUBSCRIBER
        Dummy implementation that will throw whenever it is being called.

    • Method Detail

      • onResult

        void onResult​(int numberOfFields)
       throws Exception
        Called at the beginning of a stream, guaranteed to be called exactly once.
        Parameters:
        numberOfFields - the number of fields each record of the stream will contain
        Throws:
        Exception

      • onRecord

        void onRecord()
       throws Exception
        Called whenever a new record is ready to be written
        Throws:
        Exception

      • onField

        void onField​(int offset,
             AnyValue value)
      throws Exception
        Writes the field.

        This method is guaranteed to be called exactly numberOfFields times with increasing offsets in [0, numberOfFields -1], where numberOfFields is the argument provided in onResult(int) ()}

        Parameters:
        value - the value of the field at the current offset.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • onRecordCompleted

        void onRecordCompleted()
                throws Exception
        The current record has been completed
        Throws:
        Exception

      • onError

        void onError​(Throwable throwable)
      throws Exception
        Called if an error occurs
        Parameters:
        throwable - the error
        Throws:
        Exception

      • safelyOnError

        static void safelyOnError​(QuerySubscriber subscriber,
                          Throwable t)
        Call onError while suppressing any new exception.

      • onResultCompleted

        void onResultCompleted​(QueryStatistics statistics)
        The result stream is done, no more data to stream. This means that further calls QuerySubscription.request(long) will not result in more data being streamed to the subscriber.
        Parameters:
        statistics - The query statistics of the results.
